member.name: T:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.Attributes.DataProvider
member.summary: a persistant field attribute that indicates that the field will be persisted by UserControlBase

member.name: T:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.RandomStringGenerator
member.summary: This class can generate random passwords, which do not include ambiguous characters, such as I, l, and 1. The generated password will be made of 7-bit ASCII symbols. Every four characters will include one lower case character, one upper case character, one number, and one special symbol (such as '%') in a random order. The password will always start with an alpha-numeric character; it will not start with a special symbol (we do this because some back-end systems do not like certain special characters in the first position).

member.name: M:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.RandomStringGenerator.GenerateLetterStrings(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a random string consisted of letters

member.name: M:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.RandomStringGenerator.Generate
member.remarks: The length of the generated password will be determined at random. It will be no shorter than the minimum default and no longer than maximum default.

member.name: M:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.RandomStringGenerator.Generate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random password of the exact length.

member.name: M:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.RandomStringGenerator.Generate(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remarks: The length of the generated password will be determined at random and it will fall with the range determined by the function parameters.

member.name: M:NHibernate.Burrow.TestUtil.DataProviderBase.ClearData
member.summary: Delete the test data in a FIFO fashion
